Text.val: 18.04.2012 GB SCR17237 Changed the selection, extended store the DOCP, added range DPLS_OFFICE = CLNT203_OFFICE
21.07.2011 GB SCR16625 Extended selection for DPLS "If CLNT208_HGROUP = '004'
then select only DPLS rows rows where DPLS_CREDMAN = Y"
03.10.2010 GB SCR15904 Changed place of call the GB057 (added the SelectionDPLS)
02.11.2010 GB SCR15904 Extended selection with CLNT212_FCI = 0

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT208_HGROUP, CLNT203_OFFICE from :1/CLNT, :1/ADMN where CLNT101_ADMNO = ADMN_NO and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 1 and CLNT203_OFFICE = ':2' and CLNT212_FCI = 0 and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and not (exists (select * from :1/DOCP where DOCP_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DOCP_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DOCP_INACTIVE = 'N' and DOCP_COMMERCIALLINK = 'N'))
